Container.Name: media-janitor
Container.Overview:
Proactive media library quality monitor for Plex/Radarr/Sonarr. Automatically detects and replaces bad media files.
Features: - Web UI dashboard with real-time monitoring - Validates new imports via webhooks from Radarr/Sonarr - Background scanning of existing library - Auto-replaces corrupt or wrong files - Path mismatch and duplicate detection - Plex integration (OAuth login, watch-based prioritization) - Multi-platform notifications (Discord, Slack, Telegram, etc)
After install, create config.yaml and add media path mappings.
Container.Requires: Radarr and/or Sonarr. Optional: Plex for additional features.

Config.Name: Web UI Port
Config.Description: Port for web UI and webhooks. Configure this URL in Radarr/Sonarr webhooks.

Config.Name: Config File
Config.Description: Path to config.yaml - create this file before starting

Config.Name: Media Path 1
Config.Description: Path to media files (as seen by this container). Add more paths as needed. Use :ro,slave for remote mounts.
